title: 170 - Rising Straight to the Middle with Jonnie W.
description:
Special guest Jonnie W. joins the crew to talk about the ins and outs of being a comedian, including being kinda famous, show distractions, ways they creatively connect with the audience and Olivia's scary first impression. Visit JonnieW.comto learn more about this fantastic friend of the show!
Big Thanks To Our Sponsors!
